# serializeModuleEntity

Serializes a `ModuleEntity` object into a 24-byte hex string.

## Import

```ts
import { serializeModuleEntity } from "@account-kit/smart-contracts";
```

## Usage

```ts
const entity = serializeModuleEntity({
  moduleAddress: "0xAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA",
  entityId: 1234,
});
```

## Parameters

### moduleEntity

`ModuleEntity`
The module entity to serialize

## Returns

`Hex`
A 24-byte hex string representation of the module entity
